title: Senior Engineering Manager
description:
We are Sinch. Join us and be a part of a global leader in Communication Platforms as a Service (CPaaS) and mobile customer engagement. With presence across 60 countries, we empower businesses to reach everyone in the world, in seconds or less, through mobile messaging, email, voice, and video.
   

  

 Dream big with us. We believe equal opportunities are the key to our success, no matter who you are, you'll be able to explore career options, take on captivating challenges, and build your skills alongside outstanding people.
   

  

 Sinch Operator Software & Services creates software products for mobile operator network infrastructure and services, providing efficient and scalable solutions for messaging, charging & policy control, revenue assurance and fraud prevention. These products form the foundation for many of Sinch's offerings but are also sold to and used by many of the major mobile network operators as stand-alone products.
   

  

****The essence of the role****
 Join our Operator Software & Service team as our Senior Engineering Manager in Stockholm. In this role, you'll be a crucial part of our engineering organization, focusing primarily on supporting your team members in their career development, recruiting new talent, organizing activities to boost retention, and fostering an environment where teams and individuals can thrive, while being accountable for delivering results.
   

  

 You will lead highly experienced software product teams that develop Sinch telecom products for messaging, charging and policy control.
   

  

**As Our Senior Engineering Manager, You Will**
* Lead team staffing and recruitment, capacity planning, onboarding, offboarding, and coordinating promotions.
* Collaborate with tech and product leadership to ensure your team have the right tools, skills, and processes.
* Facilitate discussions, encourage embracing change, and foster open communication to resolve conflicts.
* Support individual team members in career development, mentoring them to become our future leaders, and promoting cross-training to enhance team resilience.
* Provide insights into team performance and stakeholder perception, particularly management and business stakeholders.
* Maintain awareness of team-stakeholder relationships, addressing any issues impacting collaboration.
* Actively work with employee engagement data to create motivated teams.


****Who you are:****
 Innovation and automation are your passion, and you'll promote and support these initiatives, fostering a healthy, collaborative engineering culture that aligns with our values.
   

  

**To Contribute To This Role, We Believe You Have**
* Degree in Engineering or a related field, or equivalent experience.
* Leader with extensive experience of developing and delivering mission critical software products.
* Humble and open leadership style empowers and inspires engineers to grow.
* Excel at setting team targets, establishing effective workflows, follow-up on deliveries, and developing performance on both team and individual level.
* You possess impressive communication skills.


**What Makes You Stand Out**
* Telecom experience.
* Experience from traditional Java/VM based systems and the transition to Cloud Native.


****Are you ready? Join us on our journey!****
 We will review applications continuously and may un-post the ad sooner rather than later depending on the inflow of candidates, so please submit your resume
 **as soon as possible in English.**
**About The Recruitment Process**
 To help us place the right people in the right role, we believe in science-based and fair assessment methods. We follow a competence-based, structured interview process where your skills, experience and attributes relevant to the role and Sinch will be assessed. As part of our recruitment process, pre-employment testing is used to help us increase our hiring success by identifying the candidates that are most likely to thrive and be successful in the role. We acknowledge that there are two parties making a decision in this process and welcome you to ask any questions you may have at any stage of the process.

title: Communications Trainee
description:
**Introduction**
 At IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.
   

  

**Your Role and Responsibilities**
 OBS: Please note it is a part-time position and you have to be registered as student, preferably with 1-2 years of studies left (NOT graduate).
   

  

 We are looking for an active and energetic Communications Trainee with an interest in corporate communications, brand reputation, media relations, and PR along with employee communications and social media. We offer the opportunity to work in a multicultural organization, in a Northern, Central, and Eastern Europe Communications team along with great colleagues and opportunities to grow into Communications Professional in an international company. Preferably a Communications or Marketing student in a later stage of the studies. Proficiency in verbal and written English is required.
   

  

**Required Technical and Professional Expertise**
 OBS: Please note it is a part-time position and you have to be registered as student, preferably with 1-2 years of studies left (NOT graduate)
   

  

**Preferred Years And Fields Of Study**
* 2-3 year student in Communications, Media or Marketing


**Preferred Technical And Professional Expertise**
* Strong verbal and written communication skills
* Experience with Social media platforms
* Ability to absorb professional knowledge and develop skills quickly
* Good time management and organizational skills
* Ability to multitask and work in a fast fast-pacedronment
* Strong sense of responsibility towards work, and a team player.
* Experience with Microsoft Office


**About Business Unit**
 IBM Corporate Headquarters (CHQ) team represents a variety of functions such as marketing, finance, legal, operations, HR, and more, all working together to solve some of the world's most complex problems, help our clients achieve success and build collaborative work environments for IBMers.
   

  

**Your Life @ IBM**
 In a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as IBMers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better.
   

  

 Being an IBMer means you’ll be able to learn and develop yourself and your career, you’ll be encouraged to be courageous and experiment everyday, all whilst having continuous trust and support in an environment where everyone can thrive whatever their personal or professional background.
   

  

 Our IBMers are growth minded, always staying curious, open to feedback and learning new information and skills to constantly transform themselves and our company. They are trusted to provide on-going feedback to help other IBMers grow, as well as collaborate with colleagues keeping in mind a team focused approach to include different perspectives to drive exceptional outcomes for our customers. The courage our IBMers have to make critical decisions everyday is essential to IBM becoming the catalyst for progress, always embracing challenges with resources they have to hand, a can-do attitude and always striving for an outcome focused approach within everything that they do.
   

  

 Are you ready to be an IBMer?
   

  

**About IBM**
 IBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.
   

  

 Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the Fortune 50 companies relying on the IBM Cloud to run their business.
   

  

 At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.
   

  

**Location Statement**
 For additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application.
   

  

**Being You @ IBM**
 IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, caste, genetics, pregnancy, disability, neurodivergence, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

title: Digital utbildningsproducent
description:
**Digital utbildningsproducent med fokus på rörligt material och kreativt lärande.** 




  





 Är du en passionerad och erfaren digital utbildningsproducent med en stark känsla för färg och form? Har du erfarenhet av att skapa engagerande animeringar och film? Om du lockas av möjligheten att driva utvecklingen av vårt digitala kursutbud och sätta din kreativa prägel på branschens bästa utbildningar då är detta en chans du inte ska missa.
 



  





 Vi producerar och säljer utbildningar till våra medlemmar och andra kunder inom redovisnings- och löneområdet. Låter det intressant? Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
 



  





 Detta är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid med tillträde enligt överenskommelse. Vi sitter i ljusa lokaler centralt i Stockholm med möjlighet till distansarbete ett par dagar i veckan. Urval och intervjuer påbörjas löpande, så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.
 



  





**Om tjänsten** 




 Som digital utbildningsproducent, utvecklar och producerar du digitalt material i nära samarbete med våra erfarna ämnesexperter. Utbildningarna kan vara en del av en kurs eller program, samt fristående produktioner som marknadsförs och säljs till våra medlemmar.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter i huvudsak:** 



* Projektleda utvecklingen av nya kurser tillsammans med ämnesexperter
* Bearbeta manus
* Producera innehåll såsom text, animeringar, film, bild och ljud
* Skapa pedagogiska, digitala utbildningar i författarverktyg
* Följa upp och utveckla befintliga digitala utbildningar



  





**Vem är du?** 




 Vi söker dig som har flerårig erfarenhet av att producera digitala utbildningar och en gedigen kunskap i Adobe Creative Cloud. Du har förmågan att skapa rörligt grafiskt utbildningsmaterial, såsom korta filmer och illustrationer, och du hanterar svenska språket galant med fokus på pedagogiska texter som inspirerar till lärande. Har du även erfarenhet av spela in film är det meriterande.
 



  





**Kvalifikationer:** 



* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med digitala utbildningar
* Goda kunskaper i Adobe Creative Cloud
* Förmåga att skapa animeringar och filmer
* Stark känsla för färg och form
* Pedagogisk förmåga och erfarenhet av att bearbeta manus
* Strukturerat arbetssätt och flexibilitet
* Erfarenhet av att samarbeta med olika intressenter



  





**Om verksamheten** 




 Srf konsulterna är den ledande branschorganisationen inom redovisning, lön och rådgivning. Våra auktoriserade konsulter och deras medarbetare hjälper 300 000 företag att utvecklas. Srf konsulterna erbjuder professionell utveckling via auktorisation och utbildningar för redovisnings- och lönebranschen. Srf konsulterna grundades 1936 och driver en fortlöpande branschutveckling samt kvalitets- och kompetenshöjning av medlemmarna.
 



  





**Ansökan** 



* Ansökan skickas
 **senast 28 juni** 
 till maria.ahlstrom@srfkonsult.se



  





 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Senior Cyber Security Engineer
description:
Are you ready to take ownership of our cyber security infrastructure and platforms? We're seeking a passionate Cyber Security Engineer to build, develop, and manage these crucial components of our organization.
   

  

 In this role, you will have the opportunity to make a lasting impact by treating our cyber security domain as if it were your own infant – nurturing it, protecting it, and ensuring its growth and resilience.
   

  

 If you're ready to embrace the responsibility of safeguarding our digital assets with the same level of dedication and care as you would your own, we want to hear from you. Apply now to become an integral part of our team!
   

  

**Key Responsibilities Include But Are Not Limited To**
* Perform Security Engineering tasks (build, maintain and further develop) in Azure, Microsoft 365, AWS as well as on-prem
* Set up and manage Security Use Cases throughout their lifecycle.
* Develop, execute, and track the performance of security measures to protect information, network infrastructure, devices, and systems.
* Define and continuously improve on the cybersecurity architecture and the needs of the organization.
* Support the different disciplines within the Cyber Defence Centre (and extended Security team).


 Apply with CV in English or your complete LinkedIn profile.
   

  

 Full time employment, fixed salary.
   

  

 Planned starting date is asap.
   

  

 This position has a big preference to Västerås.
   

  

**We Believe That You Have**
* +5 years or more years work experience as a Cyber Security Engineer or related position.
* Professional practical experience in Security monitoring, detection and response and cyber threat mitigation.
* Experience in and understanding of threat intelligence, threat hunting, vulnerability management, and support for internal investigations.
* Proven experience in developing, operating and maintaining cyber security systems preferably within the aforementioned commercial Cloud Providers as well as within an open source ecosystem.
* Relevant security certifications like CCNP, GIAC, SCA, and CISSP are a plus.


**Specific Skills**
* Excellent understanding of secure network architectures, enterprise technology infrastructure, cyber security systems and security audits.
* Excellent understanding of cloud technology and cloud management.
* Proficiency in scripting using Python, Bash, Go, PowerShell and/or similar programming languages.
* Proficiency in workflow automation.
* Understanding of and interest in OT security and infrastructure as code.
* Knowledge in data analytics.


**Personal Success Factors**
* Appreciate and see a strength in collaborating with colleagues from different areas of expertise and experience.
* Curious with a strong sense of right and wrong. Always objective, unbiased and ethical.
* Solid problem-solving-, analytical- and reporting skills.
* Excellent communication skills with fluency in written and verbal English and Swedish languages.
* Proudly share knowledge and happily collaborate with, guide and support colleagues.

title: Konsultuppdrag |  Solution Architect
description:

 Solution Architect
 **Expected years of experience:** 
 6+ years

 100%

 2024-08-12

 2024-12-31

 3 days onsite Solna office
   

 @exceeds 14months, extensions included. So please take that into consideration when you submit your rate.

 : Design and implement comprehensive technology solutions that address specific business needs, ensuring alignment with organizational goals.

 • Identify potential technology solutions.

* Our client believe that you have been working as a developer before and has great technical knowledge.
